TopicTitle: Trying to to get back into Modding.

Articles.Content:
And I have a couple of questions.

1. How does the new model/texture system work. I've seen mods able to call meshes and models from other directories and use several different part CFGs with the same model. Anywhere that has the info available?

2. Ive seen command pods with extra fairings like the engines. Since my new command pods will make use of this, is there a tutorial with this info somewhere as well.

3. What happened to the IVA tutorial?

Thank you in advance.
